stereo.io.read_10x_data¶

stereo.io.read_10x_data(path, prefix='', gene_ex_only=True)¶

read 10x data

Parameters

  • path – the dictionary of the input files

  • prefix – the prefix of the input files

  • gene_ex_only – return gene expression data only if is True

Returns

anndata
